channel.title: Software on Em's Otterplex
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Em's Otterplex

item.title: Hugo Blog Online
item.description: So I decided to start a blog. It’s not a lot, but it sure took a lot of work to actually get up and running. At first I was recommended to use Jekyll for my blog, and I learned quite a bit, and even made this blog ready to use in it, until I found that Hugo was another static site generator that existed, and was supposedly faster. So in the end I just ended up making two blogs: one destined for the trash and one that you see now.
